author: newsr.in
title: Warner Bros. promotes David Haddad to president of games business
text: David Haddad, the executive who has presided over a string of hits at Warner Bros., has been promoted to president of the entertainment giant’s game business . Haddad was already head of Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment, but now he gains the title of president of the division, as announced by Diane Nelson, president of DC Entertainment and Warner […] »
